modnlp.tc.dstruct
Class Probabilities

java.lang.Object
  modnlp.tc.dstruct.Probabilities
public class Probabilities
extends java.lang.Object

Record a 4-entry joint probability table for (Boolean) random vars term and category as well as the priors for p(term) and p(category)
